t:
We stood close together holding hands and counted,
           10... 9... 8... 7... 6... 5...



As we said 4, we saw the mushroom cloud in the distance, and as we reached 1, the heat scorched our skin.
c:
Happy New Year!

Crappy New Year.



#countdown #stand #close #mushroomcloud #atombomb #death #heat #end
